Comment_contributor: ‘ingene’ = ‘hand’; ‘ufo tapa’ = ‘a half, half one, part one’

Value: ingene ufo tapa eto ingene singi eroro
ingene ufo tapa eto ingene singi eroro tapa
ingene ufo tapa eto ingene eroro tapa eto tapa
ingene ufo ufo eto utu ufo
Comment_contributor: ‘hands both of them and foot one (or feet half)’

Value: ingene ufo ufo eto utu ufo ufo
